plot: A bandit king has fallen in love, but his romantic interest has many admirers and none are willing to give up the chance of marital bliss.
title: Bongseonhwa
plot_es: A bandit king has fallen in love, but his romantic interest has many admirers and none are willing to give up the chance of marital bliss.
plot_en: A bandit king has fallen in love, but his romantic interest has many admirers and none are willing to give up the chance of marital bliss.
